quests.desc: I hope you're ready to go into rooms and interact with objects, because you've just entered TextWorld! Here is your task for today. First off, move south. Next, venture east. And then, make an effort to venture north. Next, make an effort to go east. Next, make an attempt to go to the east. With that done, travel north. Then, make an effort to head east. Next, recover the type K key from the suitcase. After that, unlock the type K safe. After that, ensure that the type K safe is open. And once you've done that, you win!
commands: take type K key from suitcase
unlock type K safe with type K key
take type K key from suitcase
unlock type K safe with type K key

infos.name: spare room
infos.desc:
You're now in a spare room.

 You see [if c_0 is locked]a locked[else if c_0 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] type K safe.[if c_0 is open and there is something in the c_0] The type K safe contains [a list of things in the c_0].[end if][if c_0 is open and the c_0 contains nothing] The type K safe is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if] You see a suitcase.[if c_1 is open and there is something in the c_1] The suitcase contains [a list of things in the c_1]. The light flickers for a second, but nothing else happens.[end if][if c_1 is open and the c_1 contains nothing] The suitcase is empty! What a waste of a day![end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unguarded. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: shower
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a shower. A typical kind of place.

 If you haven't noticed it already, there seems to be something there by the wall, it's a shelf. The shelf is usual.[if there is something on the s_0] On the shelf you can make out [a list of things on the s_0]. There's something strange about this being here, but you can't put your finger on it.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_0] But the thing is empty, unfortunately. Oh! Why couldn't there just be stuff on it?[end if] You bend down to tie your shoe. When you stand up, you notice a table. The table is standard.[if there is something on the s_1] On the table you make out [a list of things on the s_1].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_1] But the thing is empty.[end if]

There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unguarded. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: parlor
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a parlor. An usual kind of place. You try to gain information on your surroundings by using a technique you call 'looking.'



You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unblocked. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: dish-pit
infos.desc:
You've come into a normal room. Your mind races to think of what kind of room would be normal. And then it hits you. Of course. You're in the dish-pit.

 You can see [if c_2 is locked]a locked[else if c_2 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] locker here.[if c_2 is open and there is something in the c_2] The locker contains [a list of things in the c_2].[end if][if c_2 is open and the c_2 contains nothing] What a letdown! The locker is empty![end if]

There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unblocked. There is an unguarded exit to the west.

infos.name: workshop
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a workshop. An ordinary one. Okay, just remember what you're here to do, and everything will go great.

 You see [if c_3 is locked]a locked[else if c_3 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] coffer, which looks typical, nearby.[if c_3 is open and there is something in the c_3] The coffer contains [a list of things in the c_3]. The light flickers for a second, but nothing else happens.[end if][if c_3 is open and the c_3 contains nothing] What a letdown! The coffer is empty![end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unblocked. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going south.

infos.name: basement
infos.desc:
You've just shown up in a basement.

 You can make out a workbench. I guess it's true what they say, if you're looking for a workbench, go to TextWorld. [if there is something on the s_2]You see [a list of things on the s_2] on the workbench.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_2]But there isn't a thing on it. It would have been so cool if there was stuff on the workbench.[end if]

 There is [if d_3 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] portal leading south. There is [if d_4 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gateway leading west.

infos.name: sauna
infos.desc:
You have walked into the most standard of all possible saunas.



 There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] passageway leading north. There is [if d_4 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gateway leading east.

infos.name: studio
infos.desc:
You've entered a studio.



 There is [if d_3 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] portal leading north. There is an unguarded exit to the east. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: lounge
infos.desc:
Well, here we are in the lounge. You decide to just list off a complete list of everything you see in the room, because hey, why not?

 You can see a dresser.[if c_4 is open and there is something in the c_4] The dresser contains [a list of things in the c_4].[end if][if c_4 is open and the c_4 contains nothing] What a letdown! The dresser is empty![end if]

There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: canteen
infos.desc:
A well framed signboard tells you that you are now in the canteen. I guess you better just go and list everything you see here.

 Look out! It's a- oh, never mind, it's just a platter! [if there is something on the s_3]You see [a list of things on the s_3] on the platter.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_3]The platter appears to be empty. Oh! Why couldn't there just be stuff on it?[end if]

There is an unguarded exit to the west.

infos.name: washroom
infos.desc:
Ah, the washroom. This is some kind of washroom, really great ordinary vibes in this place, a wonderful ordinary atmosphere. And now, well, you're in it.

 You see [if c_5 is locked]a locked[else if c_5 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] type J safe.[if c_5 is open and there is something in the c_5] The type J safe contains [a list of things in the c_5].[end if][if c_5 is open and the c_5 contains nothing] The type J safe is empty, what a horrible day![end if] You scan the room, seeing a rack. The rack is normal.[if there is something on the s_4] On the rack you see [a list of things on the s_4].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_4] But there isn't a thing on it.[end if]

You need an unblocked exit? You should try going north. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: attic
infos.desc:
You are in an attic. An usual one.

 You make out a stand. [if there is something on the s_5]You see [a list of things on the s_5] on the stand, so there's that.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_5]But the thing is empty. What, you think everything in TextWorld should have stuff on it?[end if] You can make out a counter. The counter is normal.[if there is something on the s_6] On the counter you make out [a list of things on the s_6]. Suddenly, you bump your head on the ceiling, but it's not such a bad bump that it's going to prevent you from looking at objects and even things.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_6] But there isn't a thing on it.[end if]

There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unguarded. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going north.

infos.name: kitchenette
infos.desc:
Ah, the kitchenette. This is some kind of kitchenette, really great standard vibes in this place, a wonderful standard atmosphere.

 Oh wow! Is that what I think it is? It is! It's a board. [if there is something on the s_7]On the board you make out [a list of things on the s_7].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_7]But the thing is empty, unfortunately. Hm. Oh well[end if]

 There is [if d_2 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gate leading east. There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] door leading west. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: cubicle
infos.desc:
You've entered a cubicle. You begin to take stock of what's in the room.

 You see a mantelpiece. [if there is something on the s_8]You see [a list of things on the s_8] on the mantelpiece.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_8]Looks like someone's already been here and taken everything off it, though. Aw, here you were, all excited for there to be things on it![end if]

 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] door leading east. There is an unguarded exit to the north. There is an unguarded exit to the south.

infos.name: steam room
infos.desc:
You arrive in a steam room. A typical one. You begin looking for stuff.



 There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] passageway leading south. There is [if d_2 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gate leading west. You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unguarded. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: closet
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a closet. An usual kind of place.



You need an unguarded exit? You should try going north. There is an unguarded exit to the south. There is an unblocked exit to the west.

infos.name: restroom
infos.desc:
Guess what, you are in the place we're calling the restroom.



You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unblocked. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going north. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: pantry
infos.desc:
You arrive in a pantry. A normal one. Okay, just remember what you're here to do, and everything will go great.

 You can see a box.[if c_6 is open and there is something in the c_6] The box contains [a list of things in the c_6].[end if][if c_6 is open and the c_6 contains nothing] The box is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if]

There is an unblocked exit to the north. There is an unguarded exit to the west.

infos.name: bar
infos.desc:
You've just sauntered into a bar. You begin to take stock of what's here.

 You can make out a bookshelf. [if there is something on the s_10]On the bookshelf you can make out [a list of things on the s_10]. You can't wait to tell the folks at home about this![end if][if there is nothing on the s_10]But the thing hasn't got anything on it.[end if] You can make out a bench. [if there is something on the s_9]You see [a list of things on the s_9] on the bench.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_9]But the thing is empty.[end if]

You need an unblocked exit? You should try going north. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

You find yourself in a garage. A normal one. You begin looking for stuff.

 You bend down to tie your shoe. When you stand up, you notice a crate.[if c_7 is open and there is something in the c_7] The crate contains [a list of things in the c_7].[end if][if c_7 is open and the c_7 contains nothing] The crate is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if] You can see a safe. Suddenly, you bump your head on the ceiling, but it's not such a bad bump that it's going to prevent you from looking at objects and even things.[if c_8 is open and there is something in the c_8] The safe contains [a list of things in the c_8].[end if][if c_8 is open and the c_8 contains nothing] The safe is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unguarded.

walkthrough: take type K key from suitcase
unlock type K safe with type K key

objective: I hope you're ready to go into rooms and interact with objects, because you've just entered TextWorld! First of all, you could, like, attempt to move south. And then, attempt to take a trip east. Then, make an attempt to go north. After that, venture east. Okay, and then, attempt to head east. Then, make an attempt to take a trip north. With that accomplished, make an attempt to head east. And then, take the type K key from the suitcase. After that, make absolutely sure that the type K safe inside the spare room is unlocked. And then, open the type K safe. Got that? Good!
